name: MarkForLater
overview:
This is a tool that helps you save anything on the web for later reading. You can also add notes directly using the tool, and read them later on any device.

Key features:

  1. Organize notes and bookmarks in folders.

  2. Color code notes and bookmarks, currently three colors are supported.

  3. Add tags to notes and bookmarks. Filter by tags across all folders or in currently selected folder.

  4. Full text search. Search all notes and titles in the selected folder or across all folders.

  5. Text only. We extract the text from a saved web page, for easier, clutter and add-free reading.You can see the text only version of the website you saved by clicking on the “Text Only” link, which is available for every bookmark.

  6. Share and email. Any bookmark or note can be shared on your Facebook wall, by clicking on the Share button. You need to link your Facebook account with MarkForLater account in order to share.
